mapper.select: SELECT PB_SNO AS pbSno, TITLE AS title, SUB_TITLE AS subTitle, MAIN_PHOTO_URL AS mainPhotoUrl, ABOUT_ME AS aboutMe, CREATE_BY AS createBy FROM TB_SETUP ORDER BY PB_SNO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SETUP SET TITLE = #{title}, SUB_TITLE = #{subTitle}, MAIN_PHOTO_URL = #{mainPhotoUrl}, ABOUT_ME = #{aboutMe}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy} WHERE PB_SNO = #{pbSno}
